alert.note: Alert for Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 1:28AM EDT until August 13 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM EDT FOR HUNTERDON...MERCER...SOMERSET...WESTERN MIDDLESEX AND NORTHEASTERN BUCKS COUNTIES... At 128 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Riegelsville to near Flemington to near New Hope to Newtown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... New Brunswick, Somerville, Somerset, Old Bridge, East Brunswick, Bridgewater, South Brunswick, North Brunswick, Ewing, Middlesex, Princeton, Bound Brook, Manville, Jamesburg, Hightstown, Flemington, Cranbury, Pennington, New Hope and Hopewell. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 8A and 10. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 66 and 75. Interstate 287 in New Jersey between mile markers 5 and 18. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
